title: 1.2 Actions are by Intentions
description:
In this episode, we examine intentions that drive our actions - from gaining financial knowledge to how we act upon it.

Hosted by Almir Colan

Connect with us:

Be part of the conversation and keep in touch with us to find out about new episodes and other content.

Web: www.islamicfinancepodcast.com

Social media:

- YouTube

- Facebook (group)

- Twitter
